note.p: Education: Career: Freemason, member of Lodge No 28, formed in 1724 and erased in 1736 at the Queen's Head, Chepa Street, Bath, proposed by Charles, 2nd and last Duke of Montagu, KG, FRS, Thomas Hill, FRS, a member of the lodge at Queen's Head, Charles Stanhope FRS, of the lodge at the Bear and Harrow, and Martin Folkes, FRS, membr of Lodge No 18 at Bedford's Head, Southampton Row, Covent Gardin, London.
Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 'Freemasons and the Royal Society: Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010 page 12
